title: FTTH_FIB-Tool concept implementation infrastructure order topics (Q2/25)
description:
Description
Further requirements for the FIB tool, where concept and implementation to be done Q2/2025 will be descripted here:
(with focus on finalization interfaces to POM/IDB and PreOrder@Cloud, FIB-tool GUI functionality and migration from Interimssolution)
Overview of topics (details see checklist below)
conception work and implementation of interface to GIGA GS to be able to place infrastructure orders
conception work and implementation of interfaces to keep FIB-Tool data up-to-date (location status changes)
....
    out-of-scope in first MVP for FIB-Tool
no Public and Classified customers with extra security requirements 
no access for Offshore colleagues
no Geo-customers
Expand "Standardbauweise" for GK-customer
Wholebuy  
FIB Stand alone?          
Self.Service
Integration IKLE

realized_by.title: SDN-24231
